title: Qualcomm's new Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme and Elite chips for PCs stretch up to a record 5 GHz — 3nm Arm chips sport new Oryon Prime cores
summary: Qualcomm announced its Snapdragon X2 Elite Extreme and X2 Elite SoCs, and is making big claims about improvements over last gen.

title: Alibaba announces partnership with Nvidia despite Beijing’s bans — Chinese e-commerce giant is prioritizing AI with plans for global expansion
summary: Alibaba is partnering with Nvidia for its Physical AI software stack, while also announcing plans to expand the global footprint of its data centers.

title: OpenAI may lease Nvidia GPUs instead of buying them — financial engineering deal could cut hardware costs in pursuit of 10GW buildout
summary: OpenAI is in advanced talks to lease high-performance GPUs from Nvidia, rather than purchase them outright, as part of its plan to build out custom AI data centers over the next several years.

title: Manic Steam game collector first to surpass 40,000 game titles in library — $640,000 digital collection took 15 years to build
summary: It is notoriously easy to own more games than you have time to play on Steam, but one user has taken this phenomenon to the extreme.

title: SMI SM2504XT ES 2TB SSD Review: A Mid-Range PCIe 5.0 Challenger
summary: The SMI SM2504XT ES is a capable, power-efficient PCIe 5.0 SSD on a platform that should offer a more affordable high-end experience. It takes the competing Phison E31T to task in all the right ways.

title: AMD keeps AM4 platform on life support with 2020-era Zen 3 CPU — Ryzen 3 5100 surfaces, nine years after AM4 launch
summary: Hardware leaker momomo_us has shared a photograph of the Ryzen 3 5100, a Zen 3 processor from the Cezanne days.

title: Check that you're ready for invasive DRM with new feature built right into Steam — Secure Boot and TPM status now listed right in the app
summary: Valve has just added the ability to check your Secure Boot and TPM status in the latest Steam beta update. Secure Boot and TPM are required for most modern online games, and pretty much every anti-cheat software relies on them. Now, all you need to do is open Steam to check if they're enabled or no…

title: A global hunt to uncover a virus deadlier than Covid-19
summary: Dr Chris van Tulleken investigates a mysterious virus that could cause the next pandemic

title: Humble & sweet, but a lion - the story of the first female £1m player
summary: Meet the person behind women's football's first £1m player, Arsenal's new superstar forward Olivia Smith.

title: 'People looked at me like I was a something, not someone'
summary: In a candid interview, World Cup winner Heather Fisher discusses losing her hair and the struggle she had with her identity.

title: 'He fixes what needs fixing' - why Raducanu turned to Nadal's ex-coach
summary: Emma Raducanu recently appointed another full-time coach in Spaniard Francisco Roig - BBC Sport speaks to those who know him best.

title: 'He has made young players dream' - the making of Liverpool icon Salah
summary: BBC Sport visits Egypt to discover what Mohamed Salah means to the people of the football-mad country, and how a small boy from humble beginnings became a national icon.

title: Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in fight in US
summary: The story of Becky Zerlentes - the first female boxer to die in a sanctioned fight in the United States.

title: Lucy Bronze - the making of England's most decorated player
summary: This is the story of England defender Lucy Bronze, who is no stranger to winning and hopes for more success at Euro 2025.
